title: Filing procedure for contracts approved by
context: ยง431:10-244 Filing procedure for contracts approved by commissioner. Each insurance contract requiring approval by the commissioner pursuant to this code, section 392-48, or section 386-124 and each contract certified by the insurer to be in conformity with this code shall be accompanied by a $20 fee payable to the commissioner, which shall be deposited into the commissioner&rsquo;s education and training fund. [L 1988, c 363, ยง1; am L 2010, c 116, ยง1(14)] Cross References Commissioner&rsquo;s education and training fund, see ยง431:2-214.
